ratings.comment: Loved his class. Lots of lectures but everything is very well explained. Grading is clear. There is a weekly Quiz and HW, but he makes it very clear what will be on it.

Dr. Brown is very knowledgable in this topic and genuinely cares for his students. The class itself consisted of a quiz every week and a big project (no final). You have to read the textbook in order to do well on the quizzes, but with the app you can just listen to the textbook. (Note: took this class online during covid period)
